alert.note: Alert for East Bay Hills; East Bay Interior Valleys; San Francisco; San Francisco Bay Shoreline (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 10 at 12:19PM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Alameda, western Contra Costa and San Francisco Counties through 100 PM PST... At 1218 PM PST, the public reported strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near San Pablo to near Daly City. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... San Francisco, Oakland, Hayward, Concord, Berkeley, Richmond, Daly City, San Leandro, Alameda, Walnut Creek, Martinez, Pleasant Hill, San Pablo, Lafayette, El Cerrito, San Lorenzo, Castro Valley, Hercules, Albany and Pinole. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
